# Model Card (Template)

## 1) Model overview
- Model name:
- Version:
- Owner/team:
- Intended use (what it should do):
- Out of scope (what it must NOT be used for):

## 2) Users & impact
- Primary users:
- Affected groups:
- High-stakes context? (e.g., credit, employment, healthcare, elections): yes/no

## 3) Data
- Training data sources:
- Time range covered:
- Data consent/permission notes:
- Known gaps / skews:
- Sensitive attributes used? (yes/no). If yes, why:

## 4) Model details
- Model type (classifier, LLM, ranking, etc.):
- Inputs:
- Outputs:
- Decision threshold (if any):
- Dependencies (services, APIs):

## 5) Performance
- Metrics used:
- Overall performance:
- Segment performance (by region/group/etc.):
- Known failure modes:
- Confidence calibration (if relevant):

## 6) Safety & harm analysis
- Primary risks:
- Mitigations in place:
- Red-team summary:
- Privacy protections:
- Abuse prevention:

## 7) Monitoring & maintenance
- Monitoring signals (drift, abuse, latency, errors):
- Retraining triggers:
- Rollback plan:
- Incident process link:

## 8) Transparency
- What you tell users:
- How users can contest outcomes:
- Human override path:

## 9) Change log
- v0.1:
- v0.2:
- v1.0:
